document_data.mainbody:
ognac was a type of liquor that could be found in parts of the Realms.
* The Chateau Elite, an upscale boarding house in Daggerford, was known to serve cognac.
* In the city of Neverwinter, roasted beef prime rib was cooked in cognac, mustard, white wine, and whole peppercorns. The roast was then sliced and drowned in the sauce it was cooked in.
